price: Dájúdájú àwọn ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ni olùṣegbére nínú ìyà iná Jahanamọ.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
